refnamediv.refpurpose: Used to round a specified face of an RPP by creating an RCC based on the parameters of the RPP.

refsection.para: Used to round a specified face of an RPP by creating an RCC based on the parameters of the RPP.
The example shows the use of the rpp-arch command to create an RCC shape at a specified face of the RPP.

info.title: Create an RCC shape at a specified face of an RPP.

example.para: Creates an RCC shape named arch.s at the 1234 face of the RPP.
